mapper.select: SELECT p.prjt_id ,p.prjt_name ,t.task_name ,p.prjt_start_dt ,p.prjt_due_dt ,e.task_emp_id ,t.prjt_mat FROM prjt p join task_emps e on p.prjt_id = to_char(e.task_no) join task_common t on t.task_no = e.task_no ORDER BY p.prjt_id

SELECT p.prjt_name ,t.task_name ,t.task_no ,e.dept_name ,e.task_emp_id ,p.prjt_start_dt ,p.prjt_due_dt ,p.purpose ,p.smry FROM prjt p join task_common t on p.prjt_id = to_char(t.task_no) join task_emps e on t.task_no = e.task_no ORDER BY p.prjt_id
SELECT coop_co_no ,task_no ,co_name ,co_tel ,pic ,cust_addr ,cntn FROM coop_co ORDER BY coop_co_no
SELECT coop_co_no ,task_no ,co_name ,co_tel ,pic ,cust_addr ,cntn FROM coop_co WHERE coop_co_no =#{coopCoNo}
SELECT t.task_no ,t.task_name ,r.regu_id ,r.cre_perd ,r.active ,t.task_start_dt FROM task_common t JOIN regu_stad r ON to_char(t.task_no) = r.regu_id
